participant_1.background:
I work as an online tutor during the hours that I am awake.
i have 2 turtles.
i have a poster of neil tyson degrasse on my wall.
my favorite band is radiolead.
I am not able to afford a house because of my financial situation.

participant_2.background:
I had to move across country for my job.
I go fishing with my uncle and reminisce about the old days.
I've had to rescue people who were caught in riptides.
I like to watch YouTube videos about welding and learn new things.
I fear that I will not be able to help my patients as well as I want to.

content.text: Hi there, how are you doing?
I am doing well, thanks for asking. How are you?
I am doing well. I have been working as an online tutor for a while now and I really enjoy it.
That is great! What do you like most about it?
I love getting to help people learn and grow. I also love the flexibility of the job.
That sounds really rewarding. I am an EMT and I love helping people, but I am also worried that I won't be able to help my patients as well as I want to.
I am sure you are doing a great job! You are helping people every day and that is amazing.
Thanks for the encouragement. I have had to rescue people who were caught in riptides and it is scary, but it is also rewarding.
I can imagine that is scary, but it is also very brave. I am sure you are a great EMT.
Thanks! I appreciate that. I do love my job.
I am glad to hear that. What else do you like to do for fun?
I like to go fishing with my uncle and reminisce about the old days. I also like to watch YouTube videos about welding and learn new things.
That sounds like a lot of fun. I have always wanted to learn how to weld.
It is not too hard to learn. There are a lot of great YouTube videos that can teach you how.
I will have to check them out. Thanks for the tip.
